articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz makes Grand Slam history with win to reach US Open quarterfinals - New York Post
articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz has reached the quarterfinals of all four Grand Slams in the same season for the first time in his career after another U.S. Open win.

articles.title: Report: Chiefs CB Trent McDuffie will start the season without extension - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Chiefs and cornerback Trent McDuffie have not reached agreement on a contract extension and are not expected to before the start of the season, Nate Taylor of ESPN reports.

articles.title: Alexander Isak set for Premier League record move from Newcastle to Liverpool - NBC Sports
articles.description: It's not Newcastle's $202 million asking price but it's not far away, either — Sky Sports says Liverpool are paying a fixed fee of nearly $170 million for the playmaking Swede.
